categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the New Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: A blonde-haired female Human Jedi rendezvoused with three other Jedi on the planet Daluuj in 137 ABY, seven years after the Jedi Order was scattered by forces of the One Sith. Jedi Master Wolf Sazen called the meeting in order to propose a hunt for his former Padawan Cade Skywalker, whom he believed could rally the remaining Jedi together to oppose the Sith. The meeting was quickly interrupted by five members of the One Sith, who announced their presence by throwing a spike through Master Ahn Rasi Tuum's chest. Sazen, the Jedi Knight Shado Vao, and the female Human Jedi fought the attacking Sith, but she was killed by the lightsaber of a foe and kicked away from the battle.
The Jedi was Force-sensitive and carried a blue lightsaber, but was quickly killed by a member of the One Sith during battle on Daluuj.

This character appeared in the first four pages of the second issue of the comic series Star Wars: Legacy, written by John Ostrander, penciled by Jan Duursema, and published in 2006. She was not given a name, and died on the fourth page.
